name: Trigger Point Flip Book
descr:
This easy to use flip chart is a perfect visual aid for explaining the role of trigger points in causing pain and discomfort. Includes 33 detailed anatomical illustrations of trigger points and affected pain sensitive areas, as well as 22 diagrams of pain relief exercises. Built-in easel with heavy duty laminated pages. Markable. 9 pages.

Specifications: 28x35 cm.
